SupportGemMirageArcher.description: Supports attack skills that can be used with bows. Supported skills can only be used with bows. Cannot support Vaal skills, minion skills, movement skills, or skills used by totems, traps, or mines.
SupportGemMirageArcher.name: Mirage Archer

SupportArrowNova.description: Supports bow attack skills that fire arrows forwards as projectiles. These skills will instead fire a payload arrow into the air to land at a targeted location. The supported skills' arrows will then fire out in a circle from where it lands. Cannot support skills that already fire arrows into the air, channelled skills, or skills that create Minions.
SupportArrowNova.name: Arrow Nova

SupportLocusMine.description: Supports attack skills that use bows or wands and fire projectiles ahead. Instead of using that skill, you will throw mines that will use the skill for you when you detonate them, targeting your location. Mines cannot use channelling skills.
SupportLocusMine.name: Locus Mine

SupportGreaterVolley.description: Supports skills that fire projectiles from the user. Does not affect projectiles fired from other locations as secondary effects.
SupportGreaterVolley.name: Greater Volley

SupportTrap.description: Supports spells, or attacks that use bows or wands. Instead of using that skill, you will throw a trap that will use the skill for you when an enemy walks near it. Traps cannot use channelling skills.
SupportTrap.name: Trap

SupportBlind.description: Supports any skill that hits enemies.
SupportBlind.name: Blind

SupportManaLeech.description: Supports attack skills that hit enemies, causing those hits to leech mana based on damage dealt.
SupportManaLeech.name: Mana Leech

SupportPuncturingWeapon.description: Supports attack skills. Cannot support skills which create minions.
SupportPuncturingWeapon.name: Nightblade

SupportManaforgedArrows.description: Supports bow attack skills, causing them to trigger when you've spent enough mana in total on other bow attacks. Cannot modify the skills of minions. Cannot support totems, traps, mines, Vaal skills, or channelling skills
SupportManaforgedArrows.name: Manaforged Arrows

SupportChain.description: Supports projectile skills, and any other skills that chain.
SupportChain.name: Chain

SupportCullingStrike.description: Supports any skill that hits enemies. If enemies are left below 10% of maximum life after being hit by these skills, they will be killed.
SupportCullingStrike.name: Culling Strike

SupportCastOnDeath.description: Each supported spell skill will be triggered when you die. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
SupportCastOnDeath.name: Cast on Death

SupportAdditionalCooldown.description:
Supports skills with cooldowns.
Cannot support triggered skills.
SupportAdditionalCooldown.name: Second Wind

SupportMomentum.description: Supports attack skills that aren't triggered.
SupportMomentum.name: Momentum

SupportSlashingWeapon.description: Supports melee attack skills. Cannot support skills which create minions.
SupportSlashingWeapon.name: Close Combat

SupportAdditionalTrapMine.description: Supports skills which throw Traps or Mines.
SupportAdditionalTrapMine.name: Swift Assembly

SupportCastOnCritPlus.description: Must support both an attack skill and a spell skill to work. The attack skill will trigger a spell when it critically strikes an enemy. Cannot support totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
SupportCastOnCritPlus.name: Awakened Cast On Critical Strike

SupportRapidDecay.description: Supports any skill that has a duration, or can hit enemies to inflict ailments on them.
SupportRapidDecay.name: Swift Affliction

SupportFocusedBallista.description: Supports skills that summon ballista totems. Cannot modify the skills of minions.
SupportFocusedBallista.name: Focused Ballista

SupportAdditionalQuality.description: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the quality of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
SupportAdditionalQuality.name: Enhance

SupportVoidManipulation.description: Supports any skill that deals damage.
SupportVoidManipulation.name: Void Manipulation

SupportFork.description: Supports projectile skills, making their projectiles fork into two projectiles the first time they hit an enemy and don't pierce it.
SupportFork.name: Fork

SupportColdPenetrationPlus.description: Supports any skill that hits enemies, making those hits penetrate enemy cold resistance.
SupportColdPenetrationPlus.name: Awakened Cold Penetration

SupportMultiTrap.description: Supports traps skills, making them throw extra traps in a line.
SupportMultiTrap.name: Multiple Traps

SupportClusterTrap.description: Supports traps skills, making them throw extra traps randomly around the targeted location.
SupportClusterTrap.name: Cluster Traps

SupportBarrage.description: Supports projectile attack skills that use bows or wands. Cannot support triggered skills, channelled skills, or skills that create Minions.
SupportBarrage.name: Barrage Support

SupportForkPlus.description: Supports projectile skills, making their projectiles fork into two projectiles the first two times they hit an enemy and don't pierce it.
SupportForkPlus.name: Awakened Fork

SupportFrenzyChargeOnSlayingFrozenEnemy.description: Supports any skill you use to hit enemies yourself. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines.
SupportFrenzyChargeOnSlayingFrozenEnemy.name: Ice Bite
